card_text: If a Cyberse monster(s) with 2300 original ATK is Special Summoned: You can activate 1 of these effects, based on the Attribute of that monster(s) on the field;$N●EARTH/WATER: Halve the ATK of 1 face-up monster on the field until the end of this turn.$N●WIND/LIGHT: Negate the effects of 1 face-up card on the field until the end of this turn.$N●FIRE/DARK: Special Summon 1 "@Ignister Token" (Cyberse/DARK/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0).$NYou can only use each effect of "You and A.I." once per turn for each Attribute.
